definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: rage, be trubulent (? denom. fr. [[המון]] Thes, after Rabb.; cf. Ke RV; AV multiply; but very dub.)—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Inf. sf. [[יַעַן הֲמָנְכֶם]] [[מִן־הַגּוֹיִם]] Ez Eze 5:7 (Sm queries; Ew, after SyrVer Aq, [[הִמָּנֵכֶם]] fr. [[מנה]]); rd. rather, with Bö Co Da, [[המרותכם]] (fr. [[מרה]]) because ye rebelled.
